Neynar Web SDK - Documentation Index
Purpose: Complete SDK documentation. Find what you need using the 6 main exports below.

The 6 SDK Exports
1. @/neynar-web-sdk - Shared (Isomorphic)
Location: src/neynar-web-sdk/src/shared/llms.txt [blocked] Purpose: Components and utilities that work client + server

Exports:

Components: ExperimentalCastCard
Utilities: truncateEmail, truncateText
Types: NeynarUser
tsx


import {
  ExperimentalCastCard,
  truncateText
} from '@/neynar-web-sdk';
2. @/neynar-web-sdk/blockchain - Blockchain Integration
Location: src/neynar-web-sdk/src/blockchain/llms.txt [blocked] Purpose: Simplified blockchain transaction configuration for Farcaster mini apps

Exports:

Provider: WagmiProvider - Configures wagmi for blockchain interactions
Types: ChainName, farcasterSupportedChains - Chain configurations
tsx


import { WagmiProvider } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/blockchain';
// Minimal usage with defaults (Base chain + Farcaster connector)
<WagmiProvider>
  <YourApp />
</WagmiProvider>
// Multi-chain support
<WagmiProvider chains={["base", "ethereum", "optimism"]}>
  <YourApp />
</WagmiProvider>
3. @/neynar-web-sdk/coingecko/hooks - CoinGecko Hooks
Location: src/neynar-web-sdk/src/coingecko/hooks/llms.txt [blocked] Purpose: TanStack Query hooks for CoinGecko cryptocurrency data

40+ Hooks:

Coins: useCoinsList, useCoinsMarkets, useCoin, useCoinMarketChart, useCoinMarketChartRange, useCoinOHLC
Categories: useCoinsCategories, useCoinsCategoriesList, useAssetPlatforms
Exchanges: useExchanges, useExchange, useExchangesList, useExchangeTickers, useExchangeVolumeChart
Derivatives: useDerivatives, useDerivativesExchanges, useDerivativesExchange
Global: useGlobal, useGlobalMarketCapChart, useGlobalDefi, useCompaniesPublicTreasury
NFTs: useNFT, useNFTsList, useNFTsMarkets
On-chain: useOnchainCategories, useOnchainCategoryPools, useOnchainNetworks, useOnchainNetworkNewPools
Simple: useSimplePrice, useTokenPrice, useTokenList, useSupportedVsCurrencies
Misc: usePing, useSearch, useKeyInfo, useExchangeRates
Query Keys: coinGeckoQueryKeys - Cache key management

tsx


import {
  useCoin,
  useSimplePrice,
  coinGeckoQueryKeys
} from '@/neynar-web-sdk/coingecko/hooks';
4. @/neynar-web-sdk/coingecko/handlers - CoinGecko Server Handlers
Location: src/neynar-web-sdk/src/server/coingecko/api-handlers/ [blocked] Purpose: Server-only API route handlers for CoinGecko proxy

Exports:

createCoinGeckoApiHandler(client, config) - Creates Next.js route handlers
tsx


// src/app/api/coingecko/[...route]/route.ts
import { createCoinGeckoApiHandler } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/coingecko/handlers';
import { Coingecko } from '@coingecko/coingecko-typescript';
const client = new Coingecko({ demoAPIKey: process.env.COINGECKO_API_KEY });
export const { GET, POST, PUT, DELETE } = createCoinGeckoApiHandler(client, {
  cors: { origin: true }
});
5. @/neynar-web-sdk/neynar/hooks - Neynar Hooks
Location: src/neynar-web-sdk/src/neynar/hooks/llms.txt [blocked] Purpose: TanStack Query hooks for Neynar social network data

110+ Hooks:

Users (11): useUser, useBulkUsers, useUserByUsername, useUserSearch, useUserFollowers, useUserFollowing, useUserActiveChannels, useBulkUsersByAddress, useFollowUser, useUnfollowUser, useUserReactions
Casts (16): useCast, useBulkCasts, useCastsByUser, usePopularCastsByUser, useRepliesAndRecastsByUser, useCastConversation, useCastReactions, useCastQuotes, useCastSearch, usePublishCast, useDeleteCast, useLikeCast, useUnlikeCast
Feeds (10): useFollowingFeed, useForYouFeed, useTrendingFeed, useTrendingGlobalFeed, useChannelFeed, useChannelAndChildFeed, useMultiChannelFeed, useParentUrlFeed, useFramesFeed, useFilteredFeed
Channels (9): useChannels, useBulkChannels, useChannel, useChannelSearch, useTrendingChannels, useChannelMembers, useChannelFollowers, useFollowChannel, useUnfollowChannel, useChannelNotifications
Notifications (5): useNotifications, useNotificationsByParentUrl, useMarkNotificationsAsSeen, useNotificationTokens, usePublishFrameNotifications
Frames (9): usePostFrameAction, usePostFrameActionDeveloperManaged, useValidateFrameAction, useFrameCatalog, useRelevantFrames, useFrameSearch, usePublishNeynarFrame, useUpdateNeynarFrame, useDeleteNeynarFrame
Auth/Signers (8): useAuthorizationUrl, useDeveloperManagedAuth, useRegisterAccount, useRegisterAccountOnchain, useSigners, useSignerLookup, useRegisterSignedKey, useCreateAndRegisterSignedKey
Social (7): useBanList, usePublishBans, useDeleteBans, useBlockList, useBlockUser, useUnblockUser, useMuteList, useMuteUser, useUnmuteUser
On-chain (5): useDeployFungible, useSendFungibles, useMintNft, useSimulateNftMint, useCreateTransactionPayFrame, useTransactionPayFrame
Storage (4): useBuyStorage, useStorageAllocations, useStorageUsage, useStorageStatus
Webhooks (5): useWebhookLookup, usePublishWebhook, useUpdateWebhook, useDeleteWebhook, useUpdateWebhookActiveStatus
Subscriptions (4): useSubscribedTo, useSubscribers, useSubscriptionCheck, useSubscriptions
Misc: useFnameAvailability, useAppHostEvent, usePostAppHostEvent, usePublishReaction, useDeleteReaction, useEmbeddedUrlMetadata, useComposerActions
Query Keys: neynarQueryKeys - Cache key management

tsx


import {
  useUser,
  useCast,
  useFollowingFeed,
  neynarQueryKeys
} from '@/neynar-web-sdk/neynar/hooks';
6. @/neynar-web-sdk/neynar/handlers - Neynar Server Handlers
Location: src/neynar-web-sdk/src/server/neynar/api-handlers/ [blocked] Purpose: Server-only API route handlers for Neynar proxy

Exports:

createNeynarApiHandler(client, config) - Creates Next.js route handlers
tsx


// src/app/api/neynar/[...route]/route.ts
import { createNeynarApiHandler } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/neynar/handlers';
import { NeynarAPIClient, Configuration } from '@neynar/nodejs-sdk';
const config = new Configuration({ apiKey: process.env.NEYNAR_API_KEY });
const client = new NeynarAPIClient(config);
export const { GET, POST, PUT, DELETE } = createNeynarApiHandler(client, {
  cors: { origin: true }
});
Directory Structure


src/neynar-web-sdk/src/
├── server/                      # Server-only (Next.js API routes)
│   ├── shared/api-handlers/     # Base API handler utilities
│   ├── coingecko/api-handlers/  # CoinGecko route handlers → Export #4
│   └── neynar/api-handlers/     # Neynar route handlers → Export #6
├── shared/                      # Isomorphic (client + server) → Export #1
│   ├── components/              # UI components
│   ├── context-providers/       # React providers
│   ├── types/                   # Shared TypeScript types
│   └── utilities/               # Utility functions
├── blockchain/                  # Blockchain integration → Export #2
│   ├── types.ts                 # Chain types and configurations
│   ├── wagmi-provider.tsx       # WagmiProvider component
│   └── contracts/               # Generated contract wrappers
├── private/                     # Internal SDK utilities (not exported)
│   └── api-hooks/               # Shared TanStack Query base hooks
├── coingecko/                   # CoinGecko client SDK
│   └── hooks/                   # CoinGecko hooks → Export #3
└── neynar/                      # Neynar client SDK
    ├── hooks/                   # Neynar hooks → Export #5
    └── components/              # Neynar-specific UI
Note: The private/ folder contains internal utilities shared across the SDK but never exported to consumers. This includes base hooks like useApiQuery, useApiMutation, etc. that are used internally by the CoinGecko and Neynar hooks.

How to Use This Index
Find what you need in the 6 exports above
Navigate to tier docs using the "Location" links
Read tier overview for usage patterns
Check detailed docs in .llm/ folders for specific hooks/components
Quick Reference
Import shared utilities/components:

tsx


import { ExperimentalCastCard, truncateText } from '@/neynar-web-sdk';
Import blockchain provider:

tsx


import { WagmiProvider } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/blockchain';
Import Neynar hooks:

tsx


import { useUser, useCast, useFollowingFeed } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/neynar/hooks';
Import CoinGecko hooks:

tsx


import { useCoin, useSimplePrice } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/coingecko/hooks';
Import server handlers (API routes only):

tsx


import { createNeynarApiHandler } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/neynar/handlers';
import { createCoinGeckoApiHandler } from '@/neynar-web-sdk/coingecko/handlers';


**← End of file**
